name: Basil
description: Basil, also called great basil, is a culinary herb of the family Lamiaceae.

name: Rose
description: A rose is a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae, or the flower it bears.

name: Mango
description: The origin center of the mango is located in Southeast Asia.

name: Grapevines
description: Vitis is a genus of 79 accepted species of vining plants in the flowering plant family Vitaceae.

name: Tomatoes
description: The tomato is the edible berry of the plant Solanum lycopersicum, commonly known as a tomato plant.

name: Bell Pepper
description: The bell pepper is the fruit of plants in the Grossum cultivar group of the species Capsicum annuum.
